title: PMS 2.0 611 - Calvin Ridley Suspended For 2022 NFL Season, The Aaron Rodgers Decision Looms, Shams Charania, Darius Butler, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat, AJ Hawk, and the boys chat about all the Aaron Rodgers drama and whether or not they're surprised that Rodgers hasn't made a decision yet, AJ being in attendance at David Bakhtiari's alongside Rodgers, Matt LaFleur, and many other former Packers teammates, how the vibes were, what AJ took away from the whole weekend, when he thinks Rodgers will ultimately make his decision, and much more. They also chat about all the different franchise tagging going on, what different transactions might happen over the course of the next few days, and the breaking news that Calvin Ridley has been suspended for the 2022 NFL season for gambling on games this past year. Joining the progrum to give all the latest info on the NBA including whether or not the Lakers are back, the Nets status moving forward, Zion Williamson's injury update and being back in New Orleans, when Ben Simmons is slated to return, and more (21:02-47:12). Next, 9 year NFL vet at Defensive Back, host of the Man-To-Man podcast, Everything DB, Darius Butler joins the progrum to chat about the Patriots potentially letting JC Jackson go instead of franchising him, his thoughts on the combine, if you can take anything away from those drills at the combine, why everyone is running insane 40 times, and he chats about his thoughts about the new Batman movie that had him in a war on Twitter over the weekend (1:30:31-1:54:08). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow to watch the show and listen everyday on Sirius XM Channel 82, Mad Dog Radio. We appreciate the hell out of all of you. See you tomorrow, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
